content.rendered:
Directed by V.A. Shrikumar Menon.

Written by Harikrishnan.

Cast Mohanlal(Odiyan Manikyan). Prakash Raj(Raavunni Nair). Manju Warrier(Prabha). Manoj Joshi(Muthappan / Mootha Manikyan). Innocent(Gopi (as Innocent Vareed Thekkethala)). Siddique(Damodaran Nair). Nandu(Ezhuthachan). Narain(K. Prakashan). Kailash(Ravi). Harith Cnv(Rakesh). Sreejaya Nair(Thangamani). Sana Altaf(Meenakshi). Santhosh Keezhattoor(Vasu). Aneesh Menon(Unnikrishnan). Mammootty(Narrator (voice)). Motta Rajendran(Odiyan (as Rajendran)). Kannan Pattambi(Panchayat President). Venkitesh V.P.(Villager). Antony Perumbavoor(KSEB Employee) . Joy Badlani(Jayasurya).Sarath Sabha

Language Malayalam.

Producer Antony Perumbavoor.

Production Aashirvad Cinemas.
